thread.section_title: The Kimberly Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent location and service
thread.title_full: Excellent location and service - Review of The Kimberly Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Leeannev52
title: Excellent location and service
text:
Admittedly I booked this as a result of the previous excellent reviews, but we not in the slightest disappointed. Everything was excellent from the 'tour guide' narrative from the car driver (arranged by the hotel) on arrival to the surprise upgrade to a suite. Staff were attentive without being obsequious and we were made to feel welcome and not at all like scruffy English tourists!
